channel.description: Recent content in appointment on Belmont-MA.info

item.title: Appointment to the solid waste and recycling committee
item.description: Update I was appointed to the Solid Waste and Recycling Committee. The committee charge is to “assist the Town in procuring a new collection contract and to consider possible enhancements in recycling efforts.” If you have any views on this, please get in touch!
